div.li: CH VACD Immunization Administration Document Profile Definition of the bundle for the immunization administration document. This document is allowed to be used in context of the Swiss EPR but can also used in context of data exchange next to the Swiss EPR.

CH VACD Vaccination Record Document Profile Definition of the bundle for the vaccination record document. This document is allowed to be used in context of the Swiss EPR but can also used in context of data exchange next to the Swiss EPR.
CH VACD Immunization Recommendation Request Message Profile Definition of the bundle for the immunization recommendation request.
CH VACD Immunization Recommendation Response Message Profile Definition of the bundle for the immunization recommendation response.

CH VACD Immunization Administration Composition ProfileDefinition of the composition for the immunization administration document. This composition is allowed to be used in context of the Swiss EPR but can also used in context of data exchange next to the Swiss EPR.

CH VACD VaccinationRecord Composition Profile Definition of the composition for the vaccination record document. This composition is allowed to be used in context of the Swiss EPR but can also used in context of data exchange next to the Swiss EPR.
CH VACD Immunization Recommendation Request MessageHeader Profile Definition of the MessageHeader for the immunization recommendation request message.
CH VACD Immunization Recommendation Response MessageHeader Profile Definition of the composition for the immunization recommendation response message.
CH VACD Immunization ProfileDefinition of the immunization part for all documents, except recommendation request and response documents.
CH VACD Medical Problems Profile Definition of the medical problems part for all documents, except recommendation request and response documents.
CH VACD Past Illness Profile Definition of the past illness part for all documents, except recommendation request and response documents.
CH VACD AllergyIntolerance Profile Definition of the AllergyIntolerance part for vaccination record documents.
CH VACD Laboratory And Serology Profile Definition of the labor and serology part for all documents, except recommendation request and response documents.
CH VACD Immunization Recommendations Profile Definition of the immunization recommendation part for all documents, except recommendation request and response documents.
